short_summary: Services de nettoyage et de concierge
description: The Department of National Defence, 5th Canadian Division is seeking offers from Offerors to provide complete janitorial services for buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown Base.
full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement**
-----------------------------------

**Contract Title: Janitorial Services**
**Contract Number: W6898-230650**
**Solicitation Number: WS4129628368**

**Tender Details:**
---------------

### **Posting Date: August 15, 2023**
### **Closing Date: September 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), 5th Canadian Division, invites offers from qualified suppliers to provide complete janitorial services for buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown Base.

**Contract Period:**
------------------

The contract period is from contract award to March 31, 2024, inclusive, with an option to extend by one additional year.

**Key Requirements:**
-----------------

*   Provision of complete janitorial services for buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown Base
*   Compliance with security requirements outlined in the tender document
*   Site visit to be held on August 31, 2023; attendance is optional but strongly recommended

**Security Requirements:**
----------------------

This tender document contains a security requirement. Offerors must demonstrate compliance with the security requirements outlined in the document to be considered.

**Trade Agreements:**
-----------------

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Delivery:**
----------------------

*   New Brunswick

**Procurement Category:**
------------------------

*   Service procurement

**Procurement Method:**
---------------------

*   Competitive - Open bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:**
----------------------

*   Lowest price

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For further information, please contact Mary
